mapper.insert: INSERT INTO flowtask_task_archive ( archive_id, member_no, original_task_id, team_id, team_name, column_id, column_title, task_snapshot, archive_note, archived_at ) VALUES ( nextval('flowtask_task_archive_seq'), #{memberNo}, #{originalTaskId}, #{teamId}, #{teamName}, #{columnId}, #{columnTitle}, #{taskSnapshot}::jsonb, #{archiveNote}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
mapper.select: SELECT archive_id, member_no, original_task_id, team_id, team_name, column_id, column_title, task_snapshot::text as task_snapshot, archive_note, archived_at FROM flowtask_task_archive WHERE archive_id = #{archiveId}

SELECT archive_id, member_no, original_task_id, team_id, team_name, column_id, column_title, task_snapshot::text as task_snapshot, archive_note, archived_at FROM flowtask_task_archive WHERE member_no = #{memberNo} ORDER BY archived_at DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM flowtask_task_archive WHERE member_no = #{memberNo}
